name: Corny fun
description:
Become a fantastic orange corn-king and team up with your corn friend to beat specific obstacles. Try to collect corn as much as possible and reach the legendary corn truck 

Hi, we made another buggy and ugly game, that also pretty randomly.Sooooo... I t can be kind of funny.

I will be happy if someone enjoys playing this

With love, MRaMOR <3

How to play:

a- left, w- up, d - right, t - tower, lmb-drag
